name: The Super Roach Saga
description:
You are a homeless man on the streets of Detroit. It is your esteemed pleasure and obligation every day to acquire crack to make it to the dawn. But that's not all there is to your story...

(It's a 2.5D platformer with dialog and combat. Made in 72 hours for Moonmoon's 2022 first half game jam.)

Check out the soundtrack by CodaCoda on SoundCloud!

Controls ActionKeyboardXbox Controller

MoveWASDLeft stickJumpSpaceAShoot (once unlocked)Left CtrlXInteractEYChange camera angleQLeft bumper Credits
  • bduck#0069 - Director of Environment Art
  • CodaCoda#2486 - Director of Music
  • Dag#7300 - Director of Bits and Bytes
  • emmet#4944 - Director of Character Art

Disclaimer: The plot and dialog in this game is mostly taken from one of Moonmoon's AI dungeon stories. It contains political satire and drug references that some audiences may find offensive. Player discretion is advised.
